Class Dictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dictionary

  • public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
    filename: Dictionary.java class: Dictionary Dictionary class contains all methods that deals with dictionary for the WordJumble application, such as opening and reading a dictionary file, making it into an ArrayList of words, generating random number within the length of the dictionary to get a random index for a word, choosing a random word with that index, calling permutation class method to jumble it, and put all permuted words into another ArrayList

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dictionary() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> foundInDic(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> permutatedWords)
      this method takes an ArrayList of permuted words generated from the same class, calls the binary search method from binSearch class which checks any match, and append a found word (or two or more words) into an ArrayList
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> openDicFile(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      this method opens a file with a dic extention and calls readDic method
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> permList(java.lang.String theWord)
      this method calls a permutation method from the PermutationGenerator class, get all possible permutation of a single word and list them into an ArrayList
      protected int randomNumGen2(int dictLen)
      this method generate a random number within the length of a dictionary It is used to generate a random index to choose a random word
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readDic(java.io.File selectedFile)
      this method read the contents of a dictionary file and transfer it into an ArrayList of words
      protected java.lang.String theWord(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dictArrayList)
      this method calls the random index from the randomNumGen2 method in the same class, get the word of that index and assign it into String object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns:

        java.io.IOException

      • readDic

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readDic(java.io.File selectedFile)
        this method read the contents of a dictionary file and transfer it into an ArrayList of words
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - file to read
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all the words in the dictionary

      • randomNumGen2

        protected int randomNumGen2(int dictLen)
        this method generate a random number within the length of a dictionary It is used to generate a random index to choose a random word
        Parameters:
        dictLen - length of the dictionary (end bound)
        Returns:
        int value of random index

      • theWord

        protected java.lang.String theWord(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dictArrayList)
        this method calls the random index from the randomNumGen2 method in the same class, get the word of that index and assign it into String object
        Parameters:
        dictArrayList - ArrayList of a whole dictionary
        Returns:
        String object of the chosen random word

      • permList

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> permList(java.lang.String theWord)
        this method calls a permutation method from the PermutationGenerator class, get all possible permutation of a single word and list them into an ArrayList
        Parameters:
        theWord - word to permute
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all permuted words from a single word

      • foundInDic

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> foundInDic(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> permutatedWords)
        this method takes an ArrayList of permuted words generated from the same class, calls the binary search method from binSearch class which checks any match, and append a found word (or two or more words) into an ArrayList
        Parameters:
        permutatedWords - ArrayList of permuted words
        Returns:
        ArrayList of words that are found in the dictionary
